title: TVS Motor May total wholesales at 3,02,982 units
description: Domestic two-wheeler sales stood at 1,91,482 units last month. The company had reported sales of 52,084 units in the year-ago month. The shortage in the supply of semiconductors has impacted the production and sales of premium two-wheelers, the company said.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
